channel.description: Recent content in Demo on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: How to give a demo
item.description: outline of the blog link to a video called ’the mother of all demos’: “The Mother of All Demos is a name given retrospectively to Douglas Engelbart’s December 9, 1968, demonstration of experimental computer technologies that are now commonplace. The live demonstration featured the introduction of the computer mouse, video conferencing, teleconferencing, hypertext, word processing, hypermedia, object addressing and dynamic file linking, bootstrapping, and a collaborative real-time editor.” crucial knowledge: concept What is it?
